explains: adv. 在远方地；遥远地；远离家乡地；在田野，在野外
adj. 远方的；遥远的；远离家乡的
wordGroup: far afield 远离；广泛地（的）；闻所未闻（的）

sentences.en: Journalists came from as far afield as China.
sentences.cn: 新闻记者来自中国等遥远的地方。

sentences.en: Some of the demand for the services and goods was no doubt fulfilled by people drawn from far afield, but some local people certainly became entwined in this new economy.
sentences.cn: 无疑，一些来自遥远地区的人们对商品和服务有所需求，但同样能够肯定的是，本地人也正在和新经济产生紧密的联系。

sentences.en: You can hire a car if you want to explore further afield.
sentences.cn: 假如你想逛更远的地方，可以租辆汽车。
